dsense.name: pipeline
dsense.guideword: (pipe: transports oil, water, etc.) (石油，汽油)

example.eg: It's important to make sure the pipeline is kept in good condition.
example.egtrans: 确保管道状态良好非常重要。

example.eg: Madeleine has a direct pipeline to the president.
example.egtrans: 玛德莲与总统之间有直接的联系途径。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 传递途径, 途径, 联系途径

example.eg: This route is a food pipeline.
example.egtrans: 这一路线是粮食供应线。

example.eg: The company will pipeline the oil to a refinery.
example.egtrans: 这家公司会用管道将油运输至炼油厂。

example.eg: A gas pipeline transports gas over long distances.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 煤气管线, 煤气管道

example.eg: The company has several exciting projects in the pipeline.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在筹备中, 在规划中, 在讨论中
